sentences.sentence: And so he told me his secret formula for happiness. Part one of the two part plan was that I should just get on with ordinary life, living it day by day, like anyone else.
sentences.translation: 他告诉我他的快乐秘诀。两个秘诀其中之一就是我应该继续日常生活，像其他人那样，一天一天地过。

sentences.sentence: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
sentences.translation: 获得朋友的唯一方法是成为别人的朋友。

sentences.sentence: All friendship changes, but for the good ones it will only make it stronger.
sentences.translation: 所有的友情都会变，但有的改变会让其变得强大。

sentences.sentence: So I support that one shouldn't judge a person just from the appearance.
sentences.translation: 所以我支持不应该只从外表来判断一个人。
